name: Super Mario Land 2 + Wario's Conquest
storyline: After a crusade against the mysterious alien Tatanga in Sarasa Land, Mario decided to return back to his own island for a well earned rest. Turns out an evil creep who goes by the name of Wario took the chance of his abscence to take over Mario's castle and put the people of Mario Land under a magic spell! To reclaim his castle and free Mario Land from its new ruler, Mario must find the 6 Golden Coins scattered across the island and invade ...his own home?!
summary:
Super Mario Land 2 is back!
Relive the golden days in this remake of a classic- spiced up with lots of new features!
